\n<Ritia>Feel free to take any quests you believe
\n<Ritia>If you want to make money quickly, why not
do a few Investigation Quests? Your investigative
notes on monsters have been really valuable.
\n<Ritia>Since you do need money to equip yourselves for
those quests, we won't take the money you earn from any
other quests except those Investigative Quests.

Gale and Alain need to make enough money to pay the
guild for the curse removal. Take missions from the
[Community Quests] are quests done around the guild
and town. They are simple requests that earn the favor
of those you do them for.
[Adventurer Quests] are simple adventurer quests that
don’t pay much, but send Gale out into the field. It's
a good chance to build up some experience!
[Investigative Quests] are high paying quests that
require both Alain and Gale’s abilities together. It
is recommended to prepare for these quests before
As Alain and Gale explore and complete quests, further
\c[2]You can earn as much money as you'd like, but only
[Investigative Quests] will pay off Alain's and Gale's
Of the three quest types, only one of each type can be
Other quests will unlock as Gale proves her ability as
an adventurer and as she interacts with others.
\c[2]You can earn as much money as you'd like, but only
[Investigative Quests] will pay off Alain's and Gale's
There is a quest from the Guild Shop Clerk, Iora.
'There are a bunch of broken barrels and wooden
scraps around the guildhouse that are an
eyesore. Please get rid of them.'
The reward is 1500 G for clearing out 5 broken barrels
Report to Iora to begin the quest.
There is a quest from the Guild Receptionist Ritia.
'A bunch of adventurers brought in some golem
cores, but there's too many in the store room
and they're taking up my precious spot! Clear
The reward is 2000 G for clearing out golem parts.
Report to Ritia to begin the quest.

'Two idiot adventurers have been loitering behind the

They're talk about women is creepy.'

There is a quest from Guild Master Bryn.

The reward is some Snake Skin materials for clearing
Report to Mirie to begin the quest.

'The new-fangled 'sink' I bought from the capital and
had installed doesn't seem to be working as designed.'
'Please figure out what is wrong with it for me.'
Head to the Backroom of the Guild Shop.

There don't seem to be any other Community Quests at

Please gather 4 Blue Kalen Herbs & 2 Red Kalen Herbs
A reward of 3000 G will be provided for the successful
Head to the Eastern Forest for the quest.

4000 G will be rewarded for delivering 5 Wolf Fangs as
Head to the Eastern Forest for the quest.

The reward is 4000 G for clearing out the hideout.
Head to the Northern Road for the quest.

A reward of 3000 G will be provided for the successful
Head to the Northern Road for the quest.

A reward of 6000 G will be provided for the successful
Head to the Eastern Forest Depths for the quest.

'This quest is written in our village's special ink.

'Please deliver 5 Fuscone Shrooms to the Elf Village

The reward for this question is written as 'equipment
Head to the Forest Depths for the quest.
There is a quest from Mirie's Magic Shop.
'I need a Condensed Magic Core for my latest project.
The problem is that they aren't easy to find. Only

'I've heard rumors that there is a monster that drop

The reward for this question is written as 4000 G and
Head to the Northern Road and up past the Mountain

The reward for this question is not written.

'I will pay 50,000 G for a detailed report on the

Head to the Eastern Forest for the quest.
There is a quest from Shop Clerk Iora and Guild Master
'There have been reports of an beastkin woman
associating with thieves near the Northern Road.
She's giving us beastkin a bad name! Please
figure out what she's up to!'
'The guild believes she is an adventurer and is also
looking for identifying information on her.'
The reward 30,000 G for any information. 10,000 G more
is being added by Guild Master Bryn and anther 10,000
G is being paid by Shop Clerk Iora.
Head to the Northern Road for the quest.

On the opposite side of the request, there is more

If you can read this, you have an Intention Ring.
Please take care of this as you promised.]
[If you go up the Northern Road, there is a path to
the mountains. We were attacked at the base of the

[I'm sure that beastkin made her base up there. You may
have to solve the puzzles of those ruins to ascend.]
